MapConstant Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Constant. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Horizontal Scrollbar VisibleIf TRUE, displays the horizontal scroll bar. Details
Map KeyReference to the map key. The properties of the key apply to all keys in the map. Details
Map ValueReference to the map value. The properties of the value apply to all values in the map. Details
Number of Visible Key Value PairsNumber of visible key-value pairs in the map. Details
Top Visible KeyValue PairGet the first visible key value pair of the map constant. Details
Vertical Scrollbar VisibleIf TRUE, displays the vertical scroll bar. Details
